snippet: FIFA Secretary General Jerome Valcke is giving Brazilian organizers only a few more weeks to show that the stadium in Curitiba will be ready in time for the World Cup....

headline.print_headline: World Cup Venue in Danger of Not Being Ready
headline.main: World Cup Venue in Danger of Not Being Ready

lead_paragraph: FIFA Secretary General Jerome Valcke is giving Brazilian organizers only a few more weeks to show that the stadium in Curitiba will be ready in time for the World Cup.
